name: Let's Grow
description:
Get highest score, avoid getting hit by enemy bullets.

move W,A,S,D

on Level 1  press KEY  J ,  for  shooting cubes

After being on level 2   press   KEY  K,  for  shooting rockets

After being on level 4   press    KEY  L ,  for ground for spikes

if you have any issues on WebGl, please download the compressed file.
